document_data.caption: A map o the Muaraghal Mountains.
document_data.name: Muaraghal Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Muaraghal Mountains''' were a range of mountains in the [[Shining South]] that formed the eastern border of [[Halruaa]].

Geography.Fauna: Many dangerous species were known to inhabit the region closer toward the [[Nath]] along the outside edge of the mountains. These included [[Cyclopskin]], [[Manticore]]s, [[Roc]]s, [[Cockatrice]]s, and [[Medusa|Medusae]].
